_header: Man thou have thine thought on me
Note: Preceded by 6335, without break, but possibly originally separate.
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man — three 5-line stanzas (aaaaa, aabbb), with 2-line heading: ‘þenc man of mi harde stundes &c.’
